name: Battle Royale
description:
Play Battle Royale game in your browser.

At the beginning of the game, you pick your character, name it and set up the number of players you want to play with. The game begins on a plane from which you can jump right into the fray. Pick up all of the gear you’ll need to fight your opponents. Your objective is to be the last person alive. The main disadvantage is that you can only play against bots as of this moment. Game style is very similar to games like PUBG or Fortnite.

But this is Battle Royale game.

GameFlare.com
